title: Cant Log in for support
body:
I can't seem to log into get support

every time i goto the support page it asks me to log in to league, if i'm already log'd in or not. then when i try to Sign in, it loads the page to log in but before i can do anything it jumps too the next page saying "To log in, you must have a League of Legends account with a verified email address. We sent you an email with a link to verify your address. If you don't receive the email in the next few minutes, check out our". 

Not sending me e-mail's, tried to do this while logged in and while logged out. restarted my Comp just stuck at this point

replies.body:
This error is usually caused by a conflict with a browser setting or a problem with your temp files. You can clear out your [**browser cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to potentially resolve any conflicts, otherwise, try another web browser if the issues persist.

If none of those options worked here, let me know.
